title: Wonders of Nuclear Energy (Tell Me Why #91) (gnv64)
description:
Wonders of Nuclear Energy (Tell Me Why #91)
By Manorama
English | April 2014 | PDF | 98 pages | 15 mb
scanned to PDF by me.

A BOON OR A BANE?
The need for new sources of energy is increasing day by day, because existing energy resources are getting rapidly used up. But, nothing to worry. Science has already identified an evergreen spring of power - nuclear energy. It's the largest source of energy that Man has ever found.
However, though nuclear energy has wide uses, it also has, sadly, the power to destroy everything. The world still remembers the bombs that devastated Hiroshima and Nagasaki. The disasters at nuclear power plants have also added to the fear of nuclear energy.
As the debate on its pros and cons rages on, Tell Me Why takes you to the wonder world of nuclear energy.
